readings_insert_batch_size.description: The maximum number of readings in a batch of inserts

max_concurrent_readings_inserts.description: The maximum number of concurrent processes that send batches of readings to storage

readings_insert_batch_timeout_seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait for a readings list to reach the minimum batch size

max_readings_insert_batch_connection_idl.description: Close storage connections used to insert readings when idle for this number of seconds

readings_buffer_size.description: The maximum number of readings to buffer in memory

write_statistics_frequency_seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before writing readings-related statistics to storage

max_readings_insert_batch_reconnect_wait.description: The maximum number of seconds to wait before reconnecting to storage when inserting readings
